```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r read in data}

reg_season_salary <- read_excel("raw-data/reg season salaries.xlsx") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r manipulate data}

graph_data <- reg_season_salary %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = women:men, names_to = "team", values_to = "salary")

```


```{r make graph}
ggplot(graph_data) +
  geom_col(aes(x = games_won, y = salary, fill = team), position = "dodge") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("women" = "red", "men" = "purple4")) +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(y = "Money Earned")

```
